summary: Mod Request: While being below 20% Health the Time gets slowed
descriptionHtml:
Hello,

this is a quick solution to a mod-request over at the forums.


[b]Whenever you drop below 20% of your Health, there is a Slow-Time effect (like the one slow-time-shout does), as long as you are below 20% health. When you regain Health to get back over 20%, the effect will disappear. [/b]

Don't worry about incompabilities, I did not change records, just added a few new. I did not use scripts, this is a magic buff.

To install just use NMM or similar, then ingame open up console and type "help perk_slowtime" (without " "). This will show you a perk and its ID, looking something like XX00182C, where XX is the position in your loadorder. Then type "player.addperk XX00182C" (again without " "). Save your game and done.

For uninstallation just open console and type "player.removeperk xx00182C", save your game and delete esp.
author: JoeKa8
